title: Stop Lookking!
posting_body: ['Welocome to Sevilla Condominiums', 'Located in the beautiful City of Carrollton just minutes from great shopping and restaurants.', 'Our quite community has 1 bbedroom floor plans to suite your needs.', 'Our community offers large, open floorplans including some townhomes.', 'In our homes you will find features such as: wood-like plank style flooring, full size washer/dryer connections, fireplaces and lots of closet space.', 'These apartments were made with you in mind!', 'Ample parking, a refreshing pool (open seasonally), and tons of walking trails nearby are just some of the things you have to look forward to while making Sevilla your home.', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Disposal', '-Vaulted Ceilings', '-Off', 'Street Parking', '-Air Conditioner', '-Laundry Facility', '-Large Closets', '-Laundry Facilities', '-Air Conditioning', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Carpeted', '-Pet Friendly', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
